import sys
input = lambda : sys.stdin.readline().strip()
intput = lambda : map(int, input().split())

def solve():
    (N,) = intput()
    P = [*intput()]
    AND = (1 << 32) - 1
    for (i, x) in enumerate(P):
        if x != i:
            AND &= x
    return AND
(T,) = intput()
for _ in range(T):
    print(solve())

for s in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    r = ~0
    i = 0
    for x in map(int, s.split()):
        r &= (x, ~0)[x == i]
        i += 1
    print(r)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t = t - 1
    n = int(input())
    c = 0
    k = -1
    s = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    for i in range(0, n):
        if s[i] != i:
            k &= s[i]
    print(k)
